results.title: Simvastatin and indomethacin have similar anti-inflammatory activity in a rat model of acute local inflammation.
results.text_hl: Both @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Indomethacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007213 @@@indomethacin@@@ administered orally, 1 hr before @CHEMICAL_Carrageenan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002351 @@@carrageenan@@@ injection, significantly reduced the extent of footpad @<m>DISEASE_Tang_Hsi_Ryu_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536897 @@@oedema@@@.

citations.NLM: Nezić L, Skrbić R, Dobrić S, Stojiljković MP, Jaćević V, Satara SS, Milovanović ZA, Stojaković N. Simvastatin and indomethacin have similar anti-inflammatory activity in a rat model of acute local inflammation. Basic Clin Pharmacol Toxicol. 2009 Mar;104(3):185-91. PMID: 19210496
